metadata.title: RHSA-2019:1636: OpenShift Container Platform 4.1 jenkins-2-plugins security update (Important)
metadata.description:
This advisory contains the jenkins-2-plugins RPM packages for Red Hat
OpenShift Container Platform 4.1.4. See the following advisory for the
container images for this release:

https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHBA-2019:1635

Security Fix(es):

* jenkins-plugin-workflow-remote-loader: Unsafe Script Security whitelist 
entry in Pipeline Remote Loader Plugin (CVE-2019-10328)

* jenkins-credentials-plugin: Certificate file read vulnerability in
Credentials Plugin (CVE-2019-10320)

* jenkins-plugin-token-macro: XML External Entity processing the ${XML}
macro (CVE-2019-10337)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS
score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE
page(s) listed in the References section.

You may download the oc tool and use it to inspect release image metadata
as follows:

  $ oc adm release info quay.io/openshift-release-dev/ocp-release:4.1.4

The image digest is sha256:a6c177eb007d20bb00bfd8f829e99bd40137167480112bd5ae1c25e40a4a163a

All OpenShift Container Platform 4.1 users are advised to upgrade to these
updated packages and images.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2019-10320 jenkins-credentials-plugin: Certificate file read vulnerability in Credentials Plugin (SECURITY-1322)
CVE-2019-10328 jenkins-plugin-workflow-remote-loader: Unsafe Script Security whitelist entry in Pipeline Remote Loader Plugin (SECURITY-921)
CVE-2019-10337 jenkins-plugin-token-macro: XML External Entity processing the ${XML} macro

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
